meta.title: MoCheck - 10-Second Mobile Friendliness Checker | Google PageSpeed Insights Based
meta.description: Free website performance analysis tool using Google PageSpeed Insights official API. Check Core Web Vitals, mobile-friendliness, and SEO scores instantly.
meta.keywords: PageSpeed Insights, website performance, mobile friendliness, SEO, Core Web Vitals, website optimization, performance analysis

trust.techDescription: Google PageSpeed Insights API v5 • Lighthouse v11 • Chrome User Experience Report • Real User Monitoring (RUM) Data
trust.copyright: © 2025 MoCheck. Made with ❤️ using Google's official web performance tools
trust.disclaimer: This tool uses the same engine as Google's official PageSpeed Insights API to accurately measure website performance

improvements.title: Improvement Suggestions
improvements.subtitle: Optimization recommendations to improve your website performance
improvements.noImprovements: Excellent! No major improvement opportunities found.

audits.title: Detailed Audit Results
audits.subtitle: Complete results from all performance, accessibility, SEO, and best practices audits
audits.noResults: No results match the search criteria.

export.title: Export Results
export.subtitle: Export analysis results in different formats

tips.title: Analysis Tips
tips.largeWebsites: Complex websites may take up to 2 minutes for analysis
tips.mobileVersion: Try analyzing mobile version (e.g: m.example.com) for faster results
tips.timeout: If timeout occurs, try again later or analyze a simpler page

error.title: Analysis Error
error.networkError: Network connection error, please check your internet connection
error.timeout: Analysis timed out, please try again later
error.serverError: Server error, please try again later
error.rateLimitExceeded: API request limit exceeded, please try again later

loading.subtitle: Analyzing your website using Google PageSpeed Insights
loading.patience: Complex websites may take up to 2 minutes
